Package com.ibm.caas

Android API to request content from an MACM server.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CAASDataCallback<T>
    Callback handler invoked once the (WCM) server's response has been received.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CAASAssetRequest
    Request implementation for fetching images from the server and returning them as Bitmap objects directly usable in UI views.
    CAASContentItem
    Encapsulates the response received from the (WCM) server.
    CAASContentItemRequest
    A request object for querying details of a single content item.
    CAASContentItemsList
    Instances of this class provide access to a list of items resulting from a request, along with access to the properties of this list.
    CAASContentItemsRequest
    A request object for querying a list of content items.
    CAASErrorResult
    Encapsulates the error result of a failed query.
    CAASRequest<C>
    Abstract super class common to all requests.
    CAASRequestResult<C>
    Encapsulates the result of a request.
    CAASService
    Implementation of the service which communicates with the WCM server to authenticate and retrieve content.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CAASContentItemsRequest.WorkflowStatus
    Possible values for the workflow status.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CAASException
    Exception raised when a CaaS service operation fails.

Package com.ibm.caas Description

Android API to request content from an MACM server.

Example 1, explictely sign in to the MACM server 

   CAASService service = new CAASService("http://www.myhost.com:10039", "MyContextRoot", "MyTenant", "username", "password");

   // handle the sign-in result asynchronously
   CAASCallback<Void> callback = new CAASCallback<Void>() {
     @Override
     public void onSuccess(Void result) {
       // sign-in successful
     }

     @Override
     public void onError(CAASErrorResult error) {
       // handle the error
     }
   }

   CAASRequestResult<Void> result = service.signIn(callback);

Example 2, query the items with content type "Book" by path with implicit authentication 

   CAASService service = new CAASService("http://www.myhost.com:10039", "MyContextRoot", "MyTenant", "username", "password");

   // handle the request result asynchronously
   CAASCallback<CAASContentItemsList> callback = new CAASCallback<CAASContentItemsList>() {
     @Override
     public void onSuccess(CAASContentItemsList itemsList) {
       List<CAASContentItem>> items = itemsList.getContentItems();
       // do something with the list of items
     }

     @Override
     public void onError(CAASErrorResult error) {
       // handle the error
     }
   }

   CAASContentItemsRequest request = new CAASContentItemsRequest(callback);
   request.setPath("MACM/Content Types/Book"); // path to "Book" content items
   request.addElements("cover");               // request the url to the cover image
   request.addSortDescriptor("title", true);   // sort by ascending title
   request.setPageSize(10);                    // request the first 10 items
   request.setPageNumber(1);

   CAASRequestResult<CAASContentItemsList> result = service.executeRequest(request);
